#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

const int mod=10;

int solve(int a) {
    int res=0;
    while(a) {
        int dig=a%10;
        a/=10;
        if(dig & 1) {
            res+=dig;
        } else {
            res+=(dig<<1)%mod;
        }
    }
    return res%mod;
}

int main() {
    int test;
    scanf("%d", &test);
    while(test--) {
        int a, b;
        scanf("%d %d", &a, &b);
        int ans=0;
        while(a<b && a%10!=0) ans+=solve(a++);
        while(b>a && b%10!=0) ans+=solve(b--);
        ans+=((b-a)/10)*45;
        ans+=solve(b);
        printf("%d\n", ans);
    }
}
